chain.name: The Terrorizing Red Ribbon Pigs
procedures: Talk to Jay in Henesys.
Kill 30 Ribbon Pigs.
Return to Jay in Henesys.

chain.name: That Red Isn't For Everyone!
procedures: Talk to Alex in Kerning City.
Kill 30 Ribbon Pigs.
Return to Alex in Kerning City.

chain.name: Intimidating Octopuses
procedures: Talk to Icarus in Kerning City.
Kill 30 Octopus.
Return to Icarus in Kerning City.

name: Why Are Dark Stumps So Dark?

chain.name: Why Are Dark Stumps So Dark?
procedures: Talk to Rowen the Fairy in Ellinia.
Kill 40 Dark Stumps.
Return to Rowen the Fairy in Ellinia.

chain.name: Preparations for the Traditional Ceremony
procedures: Talk to Blackbull in Perion.
Collect 20 Leaf from Dark Stump.
Return to Blackbull in Perion.

chain.name: I Need an Umbrella!
procedures: Talk to Rina in Henesys.
Collect 20 Green Mushroom Caps from Green Mushrooms.
Return to Rina in Henesys.

name: You Were Bitten by a Green Mushroom?

chain.name: You Were Bitten by a Green Mushroom?
procedures: Talk to Betty in Ellinia.
Kill 40 Green Mushrooms.
Return to Betty in Ellinia.

chain.name: Cleaning the Nautilus 3             (Level 25 and above)
procedures: Talk to Mrs. Reade in The Nautilus: Top Floor - Hallway.
Purchase 1 Pure Water from Valen or Sleepywood Sauna.
Give the obtained item to Jack.

chain.name: Cleaning the Nautilus 1
procedures: Talk to Mrs. Reade in The Nautilus: Top Floor - Hallway.
Hunt for 50 Pig's Ribbon.
Return to her after you have collected the items.

chain.name: Cleaning the Nautilus 2             (Level 25 and above)
procedures: Talk to Mrs. Reade in The Nautilus: Top Floor - Hallway.
Hunt for 50 Rat Trap from Ratz.
Return to her after you have collected the items.

chain.name: Shumi's Request
procedures: Talk to Nella outside the Hairshop in Kerning City.
Collect 5 Processed Wood.
Collect 5 Screw.
Return to Nella and talk to her repeatedly until you receive the next request.

chain.name: Don Hwang's Request
procedures: Talk to Nella outside the Hairshop in Kerning City.
Pay her 1,000 mesos for the request.
Hunt for 50 Green Mushroom Cap.
Hunt for 50 Bubbling's Large Bubble.
Return to Nella and talk to her repeatedly until you receive the next request.

chain.name: Andre's Request
rewards: Work Gloves x 1 if you are a Beginner
Venon x 1 if you are a Warrior
Blue Morrican x 1 if you are a Magician
Blue Diros x 1 if you are a Bowman
Bronze Mischief x 1 if you are a Thief
Brown Leather Armor Glove x 1 if you are a Pirate
procedures: Talk to Nella outside the Hairshop in Kerning City.
Hunt for 100 Octopus Leg.
Purchase 1 Pure Water from Valen or from Mr. Sweatbottom in Sleepywood Sauna.
Return to Nella and talk to her repeatedly until you receive the next request.

chain.name: DANGER! <1-G. Mushroom> (Part II)                      repeatable
procedures: Search for Wanted: G. Mushroom signboard in Dungeon: Deep Forest again.
Kill 999 Green Mushroom.
Return to Sleepywood and talk to The Rememberer once you have completed the task for Part II.

chain.name: DANGER! <1-G. Mushroom> (Part I)
procedures: Search for Wanted: G. Mushroom signboard in Dungeon: Deep Forest.
Kill 99 Green Mushroom.
Go to Sleepywood and talk to The Rememberer  once you have complete Part I.

chain.name: Protect The Nautilus' Emergency Food Supply
procedures: Talk to Tangyoon in The Nautilus: Cafeteria.
Kill 30 Pig.
Kill 30 Ribbon Pig.
Return to him once you have completed the given tasks.

chain.name: Find Fresh Milk
procedures: Talk to Tangyoon in The Nautilus: Cafeteria and you will obtain 1 Milk Jug.
Talk to him again and select "Please send it to the stable".
Click on the cow with lipstick, as shown in the image below. Do this until the bottle is fully filled.
Return to Tangyoon once you have completed the task.

chain.name: Arcon's Blood?
procedures: Hunt for 40 The Charm of the Undead from Zombie Mushroom.
Talk to Manji again once you have collected the items.

chain.name: Making Sparkling Rock (2)
procedures: Give the Sparkling Rock to Teo at Lith Harbor.

chain.name: Making Sparkling Rock (1)
procedures: Search for Manji at the top left platform of Perion and talk to him.

chain.name: Delivering the Weird Medicine
procedures: Go back to Henesys and give the item to Maya.

chain.name: Maya Of Henesys
procedures: Talk to Maya in a house in Henesys.
Talk to Teo in Lith Harbor.

chain.name: Getting Arcon's Blood
procedures: Hunt for 50 Squishy Liquid from Slime.
Hunt for 50 Leaf from Dark Stump.
Hunt for 20 Octopus Leg from Octopus.
Return to Sophia in Perion after you have collected the items.

chain.name: Finding Sophia
procedures: Head over to the potion shop of Perion and talk to Sophia.

chain.name: Luke the Security Guy
procedures: Talk to Luke, who is located in Warning Street: Henesys Dungeon Entrance
Hunt for 100 Jr. Necki's Skin from Jr. Necki.
Hunt for 10 Stirge Wing from Stirge.
Obtain 1 Salad by buying it from either 24-Hr Mobile Store or Valen.
Return to Luke once you have gathered all the items.

chain.name: Arwen and Ellinia
procedures: Talk to Arwen the Fairy in Ellinia.
Kill 100 Green Mushroom.
Return to Arwen the Fairy once you have completed the task.

chain.name: John's Pink Flower Basket
rewards:
Random Reward(s) (if quest is repeated):

Adamantium Ore
Bronze Ore
Mithril Ore
Orihalcon Ore
Silver Ore
Steel Ore
procedures: Talk to John in Lith Harbor.
Go to Sleepywood and touch the Mysterious Statue.
Climb step 1 and 2 of the Deep Forest of Patience and collect the Pink Viola.
Go back to John and give him the Pink Viola.

chain.name: Help Me Find My Glasses
rewards: You will only get that reward stated if you obtain Abel's Glasses.  Otherwise, you will only receive 1,000 experience and Nautilus Return Scroll x 5
procedures: Talk to Abel in Victoria Road: Nautilus Harbor.
Head over to the right section of the map where Bart is. Below him, click on any particular part of the bush, as shown in the image below.
If you have obtained Miscellaneous Glasses, keep on clicking again and again until you obtain 1 Abel's Glasses.
Return to Abel once you have collected the item.

chain.name: A Myterious Small Egg
procedures: You will automatically receive a message from the [node:5087 link].  You will obtain 1 Mysterious Small Egg.
Go to Hidden Street: Marr's Forest and talk to Mar the Fairy.

chain.name: Sophia's Snack
procedures: Talk to Sophia in the Potion Shop in Perion.
Hunt for 20 Sap of Ancient Tree.
Return to Sophia and give her the collected items.

chain.name: Manji and the Secret Group
rewards: This quest requires a maximum level of Level 29.
procedures: Talk to Manji of Perion.
Kill 10 Dark Axe Stump.
Return and talk to Manji

chain.name: To the Desert...
procedures: Talk to Manji of Perion.

chain.name: A Special Assignment
procedures: Talk to Manji of Perion.
Then talk to Moppie in Orbis.

chain.name: A Supply from the Sand Crew
procedures: Talk to Manji of Perion.
Then deliver Moppie's Little Box to Eleska of Ariant: The Town of Ariant.

chain.name: Delivering A Box Of Fossils
procedures: Talk to Betty in Ellinia.
Give her the Fossil Box and Winston's Letter of Recommendation.

chain.name: Searching For Fossils
chain.npcLocation: Victoria Road: East Rocky Mountain II
procedures: Talk to Winston at Victoria Road: East Rocky Mountain II.
Collect 100 Animal Fossil from Green Mushroom.
Collect 100 Plant Fossil from Axe Stump.
Once you have collected all the items needed, go back to Winston and give him the items.

chain.name: Alex's Request
procedures: Talk to Alex in Kerning City (above the Pharmacy).
Head over to Henesys and talk to Chief Stan.

Choose the following answers:

Well, I'm here at the request of Alex to see you. Please give me 5 minutes.
Stop it now!  Alex is really sorry for running away.
Why don't you just ask Alex how he's doing?
I think you are a great chief of this town.
Alex has been wandering around even since his mother's passing, along with your strict nature. How about forgiving him first?
Well, I'm here at the request of Alex to see you. Please give me 5 minutes.
Stop it now!  Alex is really sorry for running away.
Why don't you just ask Alex how he's doing?
I think you are a great chief of this town.
Alex has been wandering around even since his mother's passing, along with your strict nature. How about forgiving him first?

chain.name: Mother's Gold Watch
procedures: Give the collected item to Alex in Kerning City.

chain.name: Talking To Stan
procedures: Hunt for 60 Pig's Ribbon from Ribbon Pig.
Hunt for 30 Evil Eye's Tail from Evil Eye.
Return to Chief Stan after you have collected the items.

chain.name: DANGER! <2-H. Mushroom> (Part 1)
procedures: Search for the Wanted: H. Mushroom  signboard in Dungeon: Ant Tunnel III.
Kill 99 Horny Mushroom.
Go to Sleepywood and talk to The Rememberer  once you have completed Part I.

chain.name: DANGER! <2-H. Mushroom> (Part II)                      repeatable
procedures: Search for the Wanted: H. Mushroom signboard in Dungeon: Ant Tunnel III again.
Kill 999 Horny Mushroom.
Return to Sleepywood and talk to The Rememberer once you have completed the task for Part II.

chain.name: Porchay's Letter
procedures: Talk to Porchay in The Nautilus: Generator Room and you will obtain 1 Porchay's Letter.
Head over to Aquarium: Zoo and talk to Kenta.

chain.name: A Banquet for the Whalians
procedures: Talk to Kenta once again and you will obtain 1 Whalean Canned Food.
Go to The Nautilus: Generator Room and give the item to Porchay.

chain.name: Ingredients to Get for the Banquet
procedures: Talk to Kenta in Aquarium: Zoo.
Hunt for 40 Sea Horse Tail from Seacle.
Return to him once you have collected the items.

chain.name: Pia and the Blue Mushroom
rewards: Scroll for Helmet for DEF 100% x 1
Scroll for Helmet for DEF 60% x 1
Scroll for Helmet for DEF 10% x 1
procedures: Talk to Pia in the Victoria Road: Henesys Park.
Hunt for 60 Blue Mushroom Cap from Blue Mushroom.
Hunt for 60 Green Mushroom Cap from Green Mushroom.
Return to Pia and hand over the items.

chain.name: Mrs. Ming Ming's First Worry
procedures: Talk to Mrs. Ming Ming in Henesys.
Collect 100 Pig's Ribbon from Ribbon Pig.
Collect 50 Bubbling's Large Bubble from Bubbling.
Collect 20 Slime's Bubble from Slime.
Once you have collected all the items needed, go back to Mrs. Ming Ming and give her the items.

chain.name: Planting Trees
chain.npcLocation: Victoria Road: East Rocky Mountain II
procedures: Talk to Winston at Victoria Road: East Rocky Mountain II.
Collect 54 Seedling from Ghost Stump.
Go back to Winston and give him the collected item.

chain.name: Shumi's Lost Coin
rewards: Return Scroll to Kerning City x 30
Return Scroll to Lith Harbor x 30

Random Reward(s) (if quest is repeated):

Adamantium Ore
Bronze Ore
Mithril Ore
Orihalcon Ore
Silver Ore
Steel Ore
procedures: Talk to Shumi outside the Subway Station in Kerning City.
Enter into the Victoria Road: Subway Ticketing Booth.
Buy 1 Ticket to Construction Site B1 from Jake.
Double click on The Ticket Gate to enter Construction Site B1.
Climb steps 1 and 2 of Construction Site B1 and double click on the chest at the top.
Talk to Shumi and return Shumi's Coin to her.

chain.name: Hero of the Story
procedures: Talk to Mrs. Ming Ming in Henesys.
Head over to Ellinia and talk to Wing the Fairy.

chain.name: The Old Snail
procedures: Talk to Pia in Henesys and you will obtain 1 The Snail Legend.
Next, look for Jay and talk to him to give the obtained item.

chain.name: A Rainbow Snail Shell That Makes Wishes Come True!?
procedures: Talk to Pia in Henesys.
Hunt for 1 Rainbow Colored Snail Shell from Mano.
Return to Pia after you have obtained the item.

chain.name: Snail Hunt
procedures: Talk to Wing the Fairy in Ellinia.
Hunt for 10 Blue Snail Shell.
Hunt for 10 Red Snail Shell.
Hunt for 10 Snail Shell.
Return to him after you have collected the items.

name: Welcome to New Leaf City Quiz

chain.name: Welcome to New Leaf City Quiz 3
chain.npcLocation: New Leaf City Town Street: New Leaf City - Town Center
procedures: Talk to Icebyrd Slimm at New Leaf City Town Street: New Leaf City - Town Center.
Solve the question given by him. If you answer the question incorrectly, you will have to start from the top of this quest again.

chain.npcLocation: New Leaf City Town Street: New Leaf City - Town Center
procedures: Talk to Icebyrd Slimm at New Leaf City Town Street: New Leaf City - Town Center.

chain.npcLocation: New Leaf City Town Street: New Leaf City - Town Center
procedures: Talk to Icebyrd Slimm at New Leaf City Town Street: New Leaf City - Town Center.
Solve the question given by him. If you answer the question incorrectly, you will have to start from the top of this quest again.

chain.name: Clear the Rubbish
procedures: Talk to Sureen in Singapore: Changi Airport.
Hunt for 20 Waste Paper.
Hunt for 20 Recycle Water Bottle.
Return to Sureen once you have collected the items.

name: Attracting Tourists to the Golden Temple

chain.name: Attracting Tourists to the Golden Temple
procedures: Talk to Cassandra.
Talk to Dimensional Mirror and enter in the Golden Temple.
Talk to Mr. Yoo.

chain.name: Recycled Golden Ticket
rewards: This quest can only be done once a day.
procedures: Talk to Mr. Yoo.
Hunt any monster and collect 10 Golden Ticket Piece.
Return to Mr. Yoo and talk to him.

name: Tourist Site: A Wild Monkey Mess

chain.name: Tourist Site: A Wild Monkey Mess
rewards: This quest is repeatable every 60 minutes.
procedures: Talk to Mr. Yoo.
Talk to Dao and enter in Mini Dungeon : Monkey Temple 1. You must have a Golden Ticket or Premium Golden Ticket with you to enter.
Hunt 100 Wild Monkey and collect 50 Banana Peel.
Return to Mr. Yoo and talk to him.

chain.name: Kino Konoko's Concern
procedures: Talk to Kino Konoko in Zipangu: Mushroom Shrine.
Hunt for 100 Crow Feather.
Return to her after you have completed the task.

chain.name: Red Dahlia - Thief Only
rewards: Scroll for Shoes for Speed 60% x 1
procedures: Talk to Ben in Amoria.
Hunt for 3 Diamond Ore.
Hunt for 30 Stiff Feather.
Return to Ben after you have collected the items.

chain.name: Red Dahlia - Bowman Only
rewards: Scroll for Gloves for DEX 60% x 1
procedures: Talk to Ben in Amoria.
Hunt for 3 Diamond Ore.
Hunt for 30 Stiff Feather.
Return to Ben after you have collected the items.

chain.name: Red Dahlia - Magician Only
rewards: Scroll for Shield for DEF 60% x 1
procedures: Talk to Ben in Amoria.
Hunt for 3 Diamond Ore.
Hunt for 30 Stiff Feather.
Return to Ben after you have collected the items.

chain.name: Red Dahlia - Warrior Only
rewards: Scroll for One-Handed Sword for ATT 60% x 1
procedures: Talk to Ben in Amoria.
Hunt for 3 Diamond Ore.
Hunt for 30 Stiff Feather.
Return to Ben after you have collected the items.

chain.name: Red Dahlia - Pirate Only
rewards: Scroll for Knuckler for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Gun for Attack 60% x 1
procedures: Talk to Ben in Amoria.
Hunt for 3 Diamond Ore.
Hunt for 30 Stiff Feather.
Return to Ben after you have collected the items.

chain.name: Nero's Necklace
procedures: Find Ericsson in Orbis: Orbis Park and talk to him.
Buy 1 Golden Bell and 1 Red Ribbon from the Cash Shop.
Go back to Ericsson once you have obtained the items.
